list_definition.definition: of, on or in the inside of something (eg a person’s body)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The man suffered internal injuries in the accident.

list_definition.definition: concerning what happens within a country etc, rather than its relationship with other countries etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: No country should interfere in another country’s internal affairs.

Organic systems assimilate information about the world mediated by their internal structure.
